name: Wild Side (WildSide)
description:
From childhood to decay

We are on the final call to make a difference, we have power in our choices.
Our mission is to stimulate empathy, bringing to life a world that is no longer ours.
Unleash your wild side!




THE GAME

In this adventure you'll experience forest life through unspoiled nature and desolation,
freedom and dangers of home being attacked by humanity.
Fitting the role of a fox, you'll observe a constantly changing map, face her daily life, fears, and adventures.
You'll be able to interact with other animals and nature, but watch out for hunters and flames!

 
 
 

The game is made of three acts, for a total gameplay of 20 minutes.

CREDITS

Virtual Reality, Politecnico di Torino
